channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Fire-scarred Los Angeles has been given another rare warning
item.description: Millions of Southern Californians are on edge as a final round of dangerous fire weather is forecast for the region on Wednesday, along with a rare warning of a “Particularly Dangerous Situation” for an area near where two massive blazes have killed at least 25 and destroyed thousands of homes.

item.title: Relief, 21st-century style: As wildfires burn, GoFundMe becomes a repository of harrowing stories
Federal prosecutors won’t seek charges in deadly arrest of Black motorist Ronald Greene
